summary.span: 命名空間提供類別，用來快取伺服器上經常使用的資料。

span.span: The namespace provides classes for caching frequently used data on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空間包含類別，可讓您儲存的資料物件，例如雜湊表和資料集的字典。This namespace includes the class, a dictionary that enables you to store data objects such as hash tables and data sets. 它也會提供 逾時功能為這些物件和方法，可讓您加入和移除的物件。It also provides expiration functionality for those objects, and methods that enable you to add and remove the objects. 您可以將物件加入至快取與其他檔案或快取項目上的相依性。You can add the objects to the cache with a dependency on other files or cache entries. 在此情況下，物件可以叫用回呼方法以從快取中移除物件時通知您的應用程式。In that case, the object can invoke a callback method to notify your application when an object is removed from the cache.
